{{cpp/io/fpos/title|state}}
{{cpp/io/fpos/navbar}}

{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|
State state() const;
}}
{{dcl|num=2|
void state( State st );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Manages the file position state.

@1@ Returns the value of the file position state.
@2@ Replaces the file position state with the value of {{c|st}}.

For the specializations of {{lc|std::fpos}} that are used in the standard library, {{tt|State}} is always {{lc|std::mbstate_t}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|st|new value for the state}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
@1@ The current value of the {{tt|fpos}} state.

@2@ (none)

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;cwchar&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;sstream&gt;

int main()
{
    std::istringstream s("test");
    std::mbstate_t st = s.tellg().state();
    
    if (std::mbsinit(&amp;st))
        std::cout &lt;&lt; "The stream is in the initial shift state\n";
}
|output=
The stream is in the initial shift state
}}
